entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mauricie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
